name: Angriff
description:
Simple action game on a single screen that happens to be infinitely large.

Controls:

  • Click to shoot
  • Right-click to throw grenade
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Go clockwise

Features:

  • Procedurally bad music
  • It's infinite.

Uses howler.js for music and audio.

All sounds were made with SFXR.
